data.contentText:
Includes:
Neural tube defect 
Abdominal wall defect 
Cleft palate

metadata.text1: Specifically refer to orthopaedics for bone injuries or abnormalities
metadata.text2:
If there is any fever 38.0 or more treat with antibiotics 
NTDs are high risk for sepsis and meningitis
Prophylactic antibiotics may be appropriate
metadata.text3: Discuss sensitively how antenatal folate treatment can prevent another neural tube defect in subsequent pregnancies.
metadata.title2: Treat for sepsis / risk of sepsis

data.title: MANAGEMENT
